name: Violet no Atelier
synopsis: Violet no Atelier is the 5th release in the official Atelier series, the successor to the [[Judie no Atelier: Gramnad no Renkinjutsushi]] series, and the final game in the both Gramnad series and wider "classic timeline". It was also the last of the "classically"-styled, run-an-Atelier-and-focus-on-item-crafting type Atelier games released until ''Atelier Lisa'' and ''Atelier Rorona''.
